devices.title: How to Use Devices
devices.subtitle: Quick guides for your stay
devices.climatizacion_central: The climate control is centralized. Use the touch panel in the hallway and select 'Comfort' for a pleasant temperature or 'Cool' to refresh.
devices.climatizacion_split: The split system is controlled with the remote. Press 'On' and use the arrows to adjust the temperature and mode (cool, heat, fan).
devices.hob_ceramic: To turn on the ceramic hob, tap the 'ON' symbol. Select the cooking zone with '+'. Adjust the power. Press and hold 'OFF' to turn it off.
devices.hob_induction: It's an induction hob. It only works with suitable cookware. Simply touch the cooking area to turn it on and adjust the power by sliding your finger.
devices.washing_machine_quick_wash: For a quick wash, use program 4. Add detergent in the compartment marked 'II'. Do not overload the machine.
devices.coffee_maker_refill: To refill with water, lift the top lid and fill the reservoir to the maximum mark. Use compatible Nespresso capsules.
devices.coffee_maker_drip: It's a drip coffee maker. Add water up to the maximum mark, place the filter and coffee, and press the start button.

tourism.title: Madrid Tourist Guide
tourism.intro: Madrid, the vibrant capital of Spain, perfectly combines history, art, and modern life. Discover its most iconic places.
tourism.hero_description: A curated guide to architectural marvels and hidden gems in the heart of Spain.
tourism.experiences_subtitle: Selected places for the discerning traveler.

places.royal_palace_desc: The largest functioning royal palace in Europe. Discover the throne room and the Royal Armory.
places.retiro_park_desc: Madrid's green lung. Perfect for walking, rowing on the lake, or relaxing under the trees.
places.mercado_san_miguel_desc: Historic market with fresh produce and gourmet tapas.
places.prado_museum_desc: One of the most important art museums in the world, featuring masterpieces by Velázquez, Goya, El Greco, and more.
places.thyssen_museum_desc: Private art collection spanning from the Renaissance to the 20th century.
places.reina_sofia_desc: Museum of modern and contemporary art, home to Picasso's famous Guernica.
places.plaza_mayor_desc: Historic square in the heart of Madrid, known for its symmetrical architecture and cafés.
places.templo_debod_desc: Ancient Egyptian temple relocated to Madrid, with spectacular sunset views.
places.gran_via_desc: Madrid's most iconic street, full of theaters, shops, and impressive architecture.
places.bernabeu_stadium_desc: Home of Real Madrid. Visit the stadium and museum.
places.malasana_desc: Bohemian neighborhood with shops, bars, and street art.
places.chueca_desc: Modern neighborhood, center of the LGBTQ+ community, with design shops and cafés.
places.cibeles_fountain_desc: Icon of Madrid, located at Plaza de Cibeles in front of City Hall.
places.sorolla_museum_desc: Museum dedicated to painter Joaquín Sorolla with his original house and garden.
places.campo_del_moro_desc: Historic gardens behind the Royal Palace, perfect for a quiet stroll.
places.puerta_del_sol_desc: The heart of Madrid and Spain. Kilometer Zero is located here.
places.el_rastro_desc: Famous open-air Sunday market, ideal for antiques and curiosities.
